column4: I am trying to make a nautalis script that will allow me to right click a file and mount it to a virtual CD drive. If you know anything about my scripting PLEASE visit my thread: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=653352
Just go ahead and post if you know anything I have instant email notification on that thread
i think i was a bunch of nautilus scripts in the gnome-look website, see if u can find a script that works for u there
